      • addMeasuredVariable

        int addMeasuredVariable(fr.ubo.fast.common.model.MeasuredVariable measured_variable)
        Add a measured variable defined by its name and unit.
        Parameters:
        measured_variable - Measured variable to be added.
        Returns:
        ID of the newly created measured variable, or -1 on failure.

      • deleteMeasuredVariable

        Delete a measured variable by its ID.
        Parameters:
        measured_variable_id - Measured variable ID.
        Returns:
        True if deleted successfully, false otherwise.

        Retrieve measured variable meta-data.
        Parameters:
        measured_variable_id - Measured variable ID to look up.
        Returns:

        Returns:

      • getMeasuredVariableId

        Retrieve the ID of a measured variable based on its name.
